resources.string: Anytime a Princess makes an appearance.
Every time someone farts or barfs.
Every time any person or Part of the Candy Kingdom is eaten.
Every time Ice King catpures a princess.
Anytime Princess Bubblegum gives mixed signals.
Every time Ice King\'s crown is knocked off.
Anytime Jake uses his stretchy powers.
Every time Bmo talks to himself
Every time Jake eats ice cream.
Every time Finn removes his hat!
